attributes.action: All minimum sentences currently listed on the Statute Book should be trebled
attributes.additional_details: Government legislation currently prescribes minimum sentences for various criminal offences.  It is clear that these do not act as a sufficient deterrent.  This petition calls on the government to immediately treble the length of all minimum sentences.  For example, if a minimum sentence of one year has been incorporated into legislation then this should immediately be increased to three years.
